UmbrellaTitle: feat: add feature-view toggle and fix schema tooling
UmbrellaBody:
installer skips/loads feature views via BC_INCLUDE_FEATURE_VIEWS, adds view dependency checks, and improves DDL tracing
generator merges multiple view maps per dialect, handles feature views, and makes schema split/merge append-safe
quality scripts now read per-dialect outputs; sqlfluff lint script bootstraps pip when ensurepip is missing
Dev-Workflow “Test Schema Output” points to generated schema/ outputs
PackagesTitle: chore: regenerate packages after feature-view split
PackagesBody:
regenerated package PHP/SQL for dialect-aware view maps (core vs feature)
fixed MySQL FK/index drift (users/email hash, payments/orders, invoices, idempotency_keys, inventory_reservations, order_items, coupons index)
cleaned privacy/rbac view defs to match real columns
removed stub package pq-readiness
